posts.p_message: @DietHeartNews Totally agree. Distance between China and Taiwan: 100 miles. Between US and Taiwan: 7,600 miles. Anyone with 1 marble for a brain could work out the outcome. Vietnam gave us 70's inflation. Iraq/Afghan wars gave us GFC. War with China. Does US economy collapse?

I'm in my 50s.
